casebody.data:
Millar, Appellant, v. Beacon Insurance Company of America, Appellee.

[Cite as Millar v. Beacon Ins. Co. of America (1992), 64 Ohio St.3d 96.]

(No. 92-350 Submitted May 19, 1992 Decided June 24, 1992.) Philip M. Collins & Associates and Philip M. Collins, for appellant. Isaac, Brant, Ledman & Becker, J. Stephen Teetor, James H. Ledman and David G. Jennings, for appellee.

The motion to certify is allowed. The cause is reversed and remanded on authority of State Farm Auto. Ins. Co. v. Alexander (1992), 62 Ohio St.3d 397, 583 N.E.2d 309.

*97Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Douglas, H. Brown and Resnick, JJ., concur. Holmes and Wright, JJ., dissent.
